snippet: After running the first four races of the season on the other side of the world, Formula One set up the sparkling hospitality 'motor homes' and basked in the sun of Barcelona. But the palpable sense of belonging also raised questions about how global...
abstract: After running the first four races of the season on the other side of the world, Formula One set up the sparkling hospitality 'motor homes' and basked in the sun of Barcelona. But the palpable sense of belonging also raised questions about how global the series is.
